name: BNNS.DataLayout
desc: Constants that describe the data layout of an n-dimensional array descriptor shape.

items.name: case vector
items.desc: A constant that represents a 1D vector.

items.name: case matrixColumnMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D column-major matrix.

items.name: case matrixRowMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D row-major matrix.

items.name: case matrixFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D first-major matrix.

items.name: case matrixLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 2D last-major matrix.

items.name: case imageCHW
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D image stack.

items.name: case tensor3DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor3DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D last-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor3DNSE
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D tensor with size ordered by embedding dimension, sequence length, batch size.

items.name: case tensor3DSNE
items.desc: A constant that represents a 3D tensor with size ordered by embedding dimension, batch size, sequence length.

items.name: case convolutionWeightsOIHW
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D array of convolution weights.

items.name: case tensor4DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor4DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 4D last-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor5DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 5D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor5DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 5D last-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor6DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 6D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor6DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 6D last-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor7DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 7D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor7DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 7D last-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor8DFirstMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 8D first-major tensor.

items.name: case tensor8DLastMajor
items.desc: A constant that represents a 8D last-major tensor.

items.name: var rank: Int
items.desc: The number of dimensions of the data layout.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func != (BNNS.DataLayout, BNNS.DataLayout) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: static func == (BNNS.DataLayout, BNNS.DataLayout) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
